verses.verse: רַנְּנ֣וּ <S%H7442><s%> Rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> O ye righteous בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD לַ֝יְשָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> for the upright נָאוָ֥ה <S%H5000><s%> is comely תְהִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8416><s%> [for] praise

הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> Praise לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּכִנּ֑וֹר <S%H3658><s%> with harp בְּנֵ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> unto him with the psaltery עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר <S%H6218><s%> [and] an instrument of ten strings זַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> sing לֽוֹ׃

שִֽׁירוּ־ <S%H7891><s%> Sing ל֭וֹ שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> song חָדָ֑שׁ <S%H2319><s%> unto him a new הֵיטִ֥יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> skilfully נַ֝גֵּ֗ן <S%H5059><s%> play בִּתְרוּעָֽה׃ <S%H8643><s%> with a loud noise

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> [is] right דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> For the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗הוּ <S%H4639><s%> and all his works בֶּאֱמוּנָֽה׃ <S%H530><s%> [are done] in truth

אֹ֭הֵב <S%H157><s%> He loveth צְדָקָ֣ה <S%H6666><s%> righteousness וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> of the goodness יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> is full הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> By the word יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> were the heavens נַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> made וּבְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of them by the breath פִּ֝֗יו <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָאָֽם׃ <S%H6635><s%> and all the host

כֹּנֵ֣ס <S%H3664><s%> He gathereth כַּ֭נֵּד <S%H5067><s%> together as an heap מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> the waters הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea נֹתֵ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> he layeth up בְּאֹצָר֣וֹת <S%H214><s%> in storehouses תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8415><s%> the depth

יִֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> fear מֵ֭יְהוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Let all the earth מִמֶּ֥נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at יָ֝ג֗וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> stand in awe כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> let all the inhabitants תֵבֵֽל׃ <S%H8398><s%> of the world

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For he spake וַיֶּ֑הִי <S%H1961><s%> done הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He צִ֝וָּ֗ה <S%H6680><s%> and it was [done] he commanded וַֽיַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> and it stood fast

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD הֵפִ֥יר <S%H6331><s%> to nought עֲצַת־ <S%H6098><s%> the counsel גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen הֵ֝נִ֗יא <S%H5106><s%> of none effect מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <S%H4284><s%> the devices עַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

עֲצַ֣ת <S%H6098><s%> The counsel יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever תַּעֲמֹ֑ד <S%H5975><s%> standeth מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <S%H4284><s%> the thoughts לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> of his heart לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> to all וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Blessed הַ֭גּוֹי <S%H1471><s%> [is] the nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> whose God הָעָ֓ם ׀ <S%H5971><s%> [and] the people בָּחַ֖ר <S%H977><s%> [whom] he hath chosen לְנַחֲלָ֣ה <S%H5159><s%> for his own inheritance לֽוֹ׃

מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven הִבִּ֣יט <S%H5027><s%> looketh יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD רָ֝אָ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> he beholdeth אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> all the sons הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

מִֽמְּכוֹן־ <S%H4349><s%> From the place שִׁבְתּ֥וֹ <S%H3427><s%> of his habitation הִשְׁגִּ֑יחַ <S%H7688><s%> he looketh אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> upon all the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

הַיֹּצֵ֣ר <S%H3335><s%> He fashioneth יַ֣חַד <S%H3162><s%> alike לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> their hearts הַ֝מֵּבִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> he considereth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4639><s%> all their works

אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> There is no king נוֹשָׁ֣ע <S%H3467><s%> saved בְּרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> by the multitude חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> of an host גִּ֝בּ֗וֹר <S%H1368><s%> a mighty man לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יִנָּצֵ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> is not delivered בְּרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> by much כֹּֽחַ׃ <S%H3581><s%> strength

שֶׁ֣קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [is] a vain thing הַ֭סּוּס <S%H5483><s%> An horse לִתְשׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H8668><s%> for safety וּבְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> [any] by his great חֵ֝יל֗וֹ <S%H2428><s%> strength לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְמַלֵּֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> neither shall he deliver

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> Behold the eye יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְרֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> [is] upon them that fear לַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים <S%H3176><s%> him upon them that hope לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> in his mercy
לְהַצִּ֣יל <S%H5337><s%> To deliver מִמָּ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> from death נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> their soul וּ֝לְחַיּוֹתָ֗ם <S%H2421><s%> and to keep them alive בָּרָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> in famine

נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ <S%H5315><s%> Our soul חִכְּתָ֣ה <S%H2442><s%> waiteth לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD עֶזְרֵ֖נוּ <S%H5828><s%> he [is] our help וּמָגִנֵּ֣נוּ <S%H4043><s%> and our shield הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Him

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because ב֭וֹ יִשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> shall rejoice לִבֵּ֑נוּ <S%H3820><s%> For our heart כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because בְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשׁ֣וֹ <S%H6944><s%> in his holy בָטָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H982><s%> in him because we have trusted

יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> Let חַסְדְּךָ֣ <S%H2617><s%> Let thy mercy יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> as כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר <S%H834><s%> we יִחַ֥לְנוּ <S%H3176><s%> be upon us according as we hope לָֽךְ׃
